title: Clear: Itsukatatta Ano Oka de
original_name: Clear いつか立ったあの丘で
sinopse: Clear's story is set on the island Harukajima. The protagonist, Kōichi Yukino, used to live on the island, but moved to Tokyo as a child. Kouichi comes back from Tokyo to this very ordinary and small island off the coast from mainland Japan and lives with his grandfather. When he returns, a part of his childhood memory on the island is missing. Kouichi is not a normal human; he is a type of blood-sucking vampire, though he cannot attack people.
